column4: Hi, I would like to stop nm-applet to ask for keychain password at every login. I have auto login (andf I am aware of the security) and it annoys me.
you want auto-login and wlan without typing the keyring-pass?
yes. and yes I am aware of the security here but it doenst matter
edit the keyring-pass to an empty one and then auto-login is working without typing keyword for wlan
its not secure but it is working very well
i am using it on hardy
its a surf laptop for my dad, so... :)
where do i edit the password
i tried to change it in seahorse, i.e. the password for the defualt key ring, but that dint help though
it seems i change the "default" keyring, but the one i need to cvhange is the login.keyring
